text:
Nita Pippins, 93yo retired nurse and AIDS activist who nursed her dying son and subsequently held the hands of countless AIDS pts as they passed, a substitute mother to many, died of #covid19, in a nursing home, alone, on Mother’s Day. #healthcareheroes.  
https://t.co/VrCNY6V0Is https://t.co/hJZla4wLaD
